attributes.action: ban facebook, msn, bebo, myspace and other chatting links for people under the age of 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have found out that the chatting services on the Internet are very unsafe and that most of the little children in primary and secondary have it and so it is delaying them from hard work at school and completing their homework to their full potential as they are too busy with chatting to their friends. Also, anyone can add anyone in so I believe it is very unsafe and bullying is a key often thing that happens.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
